channel.title: PLANET BEER
channel.description: Download.... then sit back, crack open a quality beer and relax to the fun antics from the team from Planet Beer. Remember to tell your mates to subscribe so we can spread the word according to beer. To listen to the show it is recommended that you have iTunes installed. If you don’t, it is available for FREE here. Those that have ipods (why would you have anything else?) can benefit from the additional features we provide with the enhanced podcast.
channel.itunes:author: Planet Beer - The Beer Show

item.title: Episode 13 Little Creatures @ the Pig
item.description: Well, we were back at one of our favourite Brisbane Pubs, The Pig & Whistle. Joining Jason, Walt & Brennan on the panel was George from Little Creatures Brewery WA.
item.itunes:subtitle: Well, we were back at one of our favourite Brisbane Pubs, The Pig & Whistle. Joining Jason, Walt & Brennan on the panel was George from Little Creatures Brewery WA.
item.itunes:summary: Well, we were back at one of our favourite Brisbane Pubs, The Pig & Whistle. Joining Jason, Walt & Brennan on the panel was George from Little Creatures Brewery WA.

item.title: Episode 13 but I think it’s only #10
item.description: Thanks to out good friends at Matilda Bay, we were sent on a road trip to sunny Melbourne to check out the Garage Brewery and have a chat with Brad Rogers, Matilda Bay’s Head Brewer. While we were dow
item.itunes:subtitle: Thanks to out good friends at Matilda Bay, we were sent on a road trip to sunny Melbourne to check out the Garage Brewery and have a chat with Brad Rogers, Matilda Bay’s Head Brewer. While we were dow
item.itunes:summary: Thanks to out good friends at Matilda Bay, we were sent on a road trip to sunny Melbourne to check out the Garage Brewery and have a chat with Brad Rogers, Matilda Bay’s Head Brewer. While we were down there we couldn’t resist checking out a few great pubs as well.

item.title: Episode #9 Pig’n’Whistle Riverside QLD
item.description: Episode #9.mp3 Back again at another Pig’n’Whistle, this time Riverside in Brisbane’s CBD. The staff here are just brilliant and so are the meals. Tonights special guest panelist is the wonderfully fu
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode #9.mp3 Back again at another Pig’n’Whistle, this time Riverside in Brisbane’s CBD. The staff here are just brilliant and so are the meals. Tonights special guest panelist is the wonderfully fu
item.itunes:summary: Episode #9.mp3 Back again at another Pig’n’Whistle, this time Riverside in Brisbane’s CBD. The staff here are just brilliant and so are the meals. Tonights special guest panelist is the wonderfully funny Gabby Millgate, who you’ll all know from her famous line “...your terrible Muriel” from the movie “Muriel’s Wedding”. She is now part of the morning crew on Brisbane’s B105FM.

item.title: Episode #8 World Tour with Beers Galore
item.description: What do you get when you combine a globe of the Earth, a dart and a semi-trailer full of every beer in the world?...... A whole lot of fun, that’s what! Thanks to our friends at BeersGalore.com we ta
item.itunes:subtitle: What do you get when you combine a globe of the Earth, a dart and a semi-trailer full of every beer in the world?...... A whole lot of fun, that’s what! Thanks to our friends at BeersGalore.com we ta
item.itunes:summary: What do you get when you combine a globe of the Earth, a dart and a semi-trailer full of every beer in the world?...... A whole lot of fun, that’s what! Thanks to our friends at BeersGalore.com we take pot shots at our spinning globe and where the dart lands... that’s the country whose beer we are drinking. This episode we hit: Mexico - Tecate, UK - Spitfire & Denmark - Carlsberg Special Brew CLICK HERE FOR MP3 VERSION

item.title: Episode #7 Backyard BBQ Special
item.description: There is nothing better than having hundreds of friends drop by for a BBQ on a Friday night while sitting and drink quality beer and not a XXXX or a VB in site. We talk to Dave the butcher, from Reed
item.itunes:subtitle: There is nothing better than having hundreds of friends drop by for a BBQ on a Friday night while sitting and drink quality beer and not a XXXX or a VB in site. We talk to Dave the butcher, from Reed
item.itunes:summary: There is nothing better than having hundreds of friends drop by for a BBQ on a Friday night while sitting and drink quality beer and not a XXXX or a VB in site. We talk to Dave the butcher, from Reedy Creek Butchers about what really is inside of a sausage and we talk about their famous beef jerky. We road test Matilda Bay’s Rooftop Red Lager and Hoegaarden. Tonights backyard band is back by popular demand and the fact we forgot to pay them last time they were on the show, Halfway.
